# library
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)    # color
```
```{r}
mtcars <- mtcars
names(mtcars)
```

# basic plot
## plot
```{r}
with(mtcars,{
  plot(wt, mpg)
  title("MPG")
})
```
### options
1. function
```{r}
opar <- par(no.readonly = TRUE)
par(lty=2, pch=17)
with(mtcars,{
  plot(wt, mpg)
  title("MPG")
})
par(opar)
```
2. key-value
```{r}
plot(mtcars$wt, mtcars$mpg, lty=2, pch=17)
```

#### options
